publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2380 Mr Andrew Welsh: The Conservation of Salmon (Esk Salmon Fishery District) Regulations 2005â€”That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Conservation of Salmon (Esk Salmon Fishery District) Regulations 2005 (SSI 2005/24).
